name: Accelerated Generation
description: On Action, if it was this monster's second Action of the same turn: Generates Wild Aether.

name: Aether Cycle
description: Aura: For every 7 Aether consumed by allies: Generates Wild Aether.

name: Aether Fiend
description: Whenever this monster Purges or Steals Aether: Generates 1 additional Aether of the same element. This monster takes 1 more damage from all Hits.

name: Aether Shield
description: Whenever this monster generates or consumes Aether: Shields self equal to the amount of generated or consumed Aether.

name: Aethereal Regeneration
description: Aura: For every 3 consumed Regeneration stacks: Generates 1 Random Aether.

name: Afterstorm
description: Aura: Whenever an ally evades a Hit: Deals a 5 Wind damage Hit to the attacker. Triggers up to once per enemy per turn.

name: Aggressive Purging
description: Aura: On every 4 Attacks from allies: Purges 1 enemy Aether.

name: Ancient Power
description: Gains Aging. For every 3 Age: Applies 1 Power to self.

name: Ascension
description: Aura: For every 100 Healing of your allies: Applies 2 Power to each ally. Triggers up to once per combat.

name: Auto Heal
description: On Attack: Heals the ally with the lowest health by 2 x 2.

name: Blind
description: Aura: Enemies with Terror have a 15% chance to miss each Hit. Whenever an enemy misses a Hit: Applies Terror to them.

name: Blood Pact
description: Aura: At the end of your turn: Deals a Water hit to all enemies; damage equals 1 for every 5 healing received by allies this round. Doesn't trigger Retaliate.

name: Burning Fire
description: Aura: For every 3 Fire Aether consumed by allies: Applies Burn to all enemies.

name: Cleanse Corruption
description:
Healing +1.
Aura: Whenever an ally is healed to full health: Cleanses 2 Corruption from them. Triggers up to once per monster per combat.

name: Clone Summoning
description: When a Minion is summoned on another ally: Summons a copy of it attached to this monster; both of them have half of the Essence, rounded up. Triggers up to once per turn.

name: Concealed
description: At the start of combat and On Dedicated Support Action: Applies Dodge and Shields self for 2.

name: Contagion
description: Aura: Whenever an enemy's Weakness is consumed: 50% chance to apply Weakness to another random enemy.

name: Cosmic Healing
description: Aura: For every 50 healing of your allies: Generates 1 Wild Aether.

name: Cosmic Hex
description: Aura: Whenever an enemy is staggered: Consumes all stacks of Weakness on them to generate Wild Aether for each one.

name: Cosmic Horror
description:
Terror Application +1.
At the start of your turn: Generates Wild Aether for every enemy with 5 or more Terror.

name: Cosmic Torment
description: Aura: For every 8 debuffs applied to allies: Generates Wild Aether.

name: Cosmic Wisdom
description: Gains Aging. For every 2 Age: Generates Wild Aether.

name: Critical Aether
description:
Crit Chance +10%.
On every 3 Crits: Generates Wild Aether.

name: Critical Hybridization
description: On Crit: Deals a 3 Wild Damage Hit.Triggers up to once per Action.

name: Cruelty
description: +3 Crit Damage. At the start of combat and whenever an enemy is staggered: Applies 1 Force to self.

name: Decay
description: Gains Aging. For every 4 Age: Triggers an Attack against all enemies with 2 Earth/Water Hits; damage of each Hit equals the amount of Age stacks on this monster.

name: Disruptive Prime
description: For every 3 Aether purged or stolen by this monster: Applies Power to self.

name: Emergency Response
description: Aura: At the start of your turn: Shields all allies for 2; triggers one more time for allies with 50% or less health.

name: Enkindled Aether
description: On Attack: Consumes up to one Fire Aether to deal a 5 Fire damage Hit and apply 3 Burn to Target Enemy.

name: Eye of the Storm
description: Aura: For every 30 Wind or Wild Damage dealt to enemies: Applies Dodge to the ally with the lowest amount of Dodge.

name: Fatal Upkeep
description: Aura: Debuffs deal 4 more damage against enemies.

name: Forceful Generation
description: Aura: When an ally reaches 2 Force stacks: It generates 2 Random Aether. Triggers up to once per ally per combat,

name: Golden Age
description: Aura: For every 4 Age on an ally: Cleanses 4 debuffs from them and applies Age to them.

name: Haste
description: Aura: Dodge now only increases Evasion by 12% per stack and doesn't get consumed when attacked. After an ally's turn, they consume 5 stacks of Dodge to Reactivate their turn.

name: Healthy Cleanse
description: Aura: At the start of your turn: Cleanses 2 debuffs from each ally. Whenever a debuff is cleansed from an ally: Shields them for 2.

name: Helping Winds
description: For every 3 Wind Aether consumed by allies: Applies Sidekick to self.

name: Heroic Defense
description: While this monster has Force, it gains +2 Defense and takes 1 less Corruption from enemy Attacks.

name: Hexing Strikes
description: On Attack: Applies 2 Weakness to Target Enemy.

name: Hunt
description: Aura: Allies gain +15% Crit Chance.

name: Impactful Summoning
description: When this monster summons a Minion: Deals a 3 damage Hit of the minion's Elements to all enemies. Doesn't trigger retaliates.

name: Incorruptible
description: Retaliate: Shields self for 4. If this Trait triggers 3 times: Cleanses 3 Corruption from self. Only cleanses Corruption up to once per combat

name: Incubation
description: Aura: Poison no longer triggers at the start of turn. Poison damage is doubled. This applies to both allies and enemies.

name: Into the Fray
description: On Dedicated Support Action: Applies 1 Force to target ally and 1 Force to self.

name: Joint Protection
description: Aura: Whenever an ally triggers Sidekick: Shields both attackers for 2.

name: Kindle
description: Aura: For every 4 Burn applied to enemies: Generates Fire Aether.

name: Leadership
description: Aura: As long as this monster has Sidekick, other allies gain +2 Damage.

name: Long-Lived
description: Aura: Whenever Regeneration stacks are applied to an ally: Applies an additional stack. The healing of Regeneration stacks is reduced by 1.

name: Magnus Hit
description: On Attack: Deals a Hit with damage equal to the total amount of Power in the party.

name: Make It Double
description: Aura: Sidekick Attacks on allies deals 2 x 2 damage Hits.

name: Meditation
description: On every 2 Support Actions: Applies Power to self.

name: Momentum
description: On every 3 Attacks: Applies Power to self.

name: Nightmare
description:
Terror Application +1.
At the start of your turn: Deals a Wild Damage Hit with 9 damage to all enemies with 5 or more Terror.

name: Outlast
description: Gains Aging. Whenever Age is applied to this monster: Heals and Shields self for 3.

name: Panic
description: Aura: Whenever a Wild Damage Hit staggers an enemy: Purges 1 enemy Aether and applies 5 Terror to each other enemy.

name: Peak Performance
description: Aura: Whenever an ally reaches 4 debuff stacks: Applies Power and Shields them for 4. Triggers up to once per monster per combat.

name: Perfect Edge
description: Aura: Force stacks on allies now only apply to the first Hit of each Attack. Allies deal +2 Crit Damage for every stack of Force on them.

name: Permafrost
description: Aura: Instead of Shields on allies vanishing at the start of your turn, half of all Shields are retained, rounded up.

name: Plague
description: Aura: Whenever Poison triggers on an enemy: Applies Poison to all enemies.

name: Poise Purging
description: Whenever this Monster Purges or Steals Aether: Breaks 1 Poise of the same element on all enemies.

name: Polluted Aether
description: On Attack: Consumes up to one Earth Aether to deal a 6 Earth damage Hit and apply 6 Poison to Target Enemy.

name: Power Generator
description: Aura: For every 3 Power applied to allies: Generates 1 Random Aether.

name: Protective Servitude
description: Aura: On Action from an allied Minion: Consumes 1 Essence on that Minion to heal and Shield its attached monster by 5.

name: Protector
description: Aura: As long as this monster has Redirect, allies gain +1 Defense and +1 Shielding.

name: Quickened Summoning
description: If this monster has not used a Free Action in its turn yet, it can use any Summoning Action as a Free Action.

name: Rapid Fire
description: Aura: Whenever an enemy gets attacked for the second time in the same turn: Triggers Burn on them.

name: Regenerated Prime
description: Aura: For every 3 consumed Regeneration stacks: Applies Power to the ally wkth the least amount of Power.

name: Regenerating Water
description: Aura: On Water Action from any ally: Applies Regeneration on the ally with the lowest amount of Regeneration.

name: Regeneration Shield
description: Aura: Whenever Regeneration triggers on an ally: Shields them for 4.

name: Reinforce
description: On Dedicated Support Action: Heals target ally for 5, Shields them for 3, and applies 1 Force to them.

name: Return to Aether
description: Retaliate: Generates Random Aether.

name: Rising Fire
description: Aura: Whenever Burn triggers on an enemy: Applies Burn to the enemy with the lowest amount of Burn.

name: Safeguard
description:
Corruption Cleanse +2.
At the end of your turn, if this monster has less than 8 Shield: Shields self equal to the difference.

name: Sensitivity
description: Aura: Weakness only reduces damage by 2, but each Hit against enemies with Weakness deals 2 more damage.

name: Shared Torment
description: Whenever a debuff stack is applied to this monster: Applies the same debuff to another random ally or enemy.

name: Shield Hit
description: On Attack: Deals a Hit with damage equal to half this monster's Shield, rounded up.

name: Shielding Winds
description: Aura: On Wind Action from any ally: Shields that ally for 4.

name: Shock
description: On Interrupt: Deals a 6 Fire/Wind damage Hit to that enemy.

name: Sidekick Generator
description: Whenever Sidekick is applied to this monster: Generates 1 Random Aether.

name: Sleight of Hand
description: +3 Crit Damage. Every third Hit of an Action is a Critical Hit. For multi-target Actions, it is every second Hit against each monster instead.

name: Summon Mastery
description:
Aura:: Minion Damage +1.
This monster can have 1 additional Minion attached to it.

name: Support Attacks
description: On Support Action: Deals a 3 damage Hit to Target Enemy and triggers On Attack effects.

name: Synchronous Majesty
description: Aura: When you reach 5 Aether of the same element: Purges 1 enemy Aether of the same element and applies Power to self. Triggers up to once per element per combat.

name: Tactical Shields
description: Aura: Allies with 7 or more Shield gain +1 Damage and +15% Crit Chance.

name: Tailwind
description: Aura: Whenever an ally evades a Hit: Generates Wind Aether; if you have 5 or more Wind Aether, Wild Aether is generated instead. Triggers up to once per ally per turn.

name: Taunt
description: At the start of combat: Applies 2 Redirect and Shields self 2 x 3.

name: Torment Doubling
description: On Action, if the Action applied debuffs to enemies: Applies those debuffs another time to the enemies and to self.

name: Toxic Earth
description: Aura: On Earth Action from any ally: Applies Poison to each enemy.

name: Void Burn
description: Aura: At the start of your turn: Generates Wild/Wild Aether. At the end of your turn: Consumes Wild/Wild Aether and deals a 3 damage Hit to this Monster for each.

name: Warlock Party
description: Aura: On Support Action from any ally: Applies 2 Weakness distributed among enemies with the lowest amount of Weakness.

name: Wild Fear
description:
Terror Application +1.
Wild Damage Hits of this monster gain +1 Poise Damage.

name: Aether Breath
description: Aura: For every 20 Aether consumed by allies: Applies 2 Power to this monster and triggers an Attack against all enemies for 3 x 2 Wild Damage. Triggers up to once per combat.

name: Age Absorption
description: For every 10 damage absorbed by Shields on this monster: Applies Age to self.

name: Age of Fire
description: Gains Aging. For every 2 Age: Applies Burn stacks to all enemies equal to half of the amount of Age stacks on this monster.

name: Assault Shield
description: On Crit: Shields the ally with the lowest amount of Shield for 3.

name: Beacon
description: Aura: Whenever one or more Regeneration stacks are consumed by an ally: Consumes a Burn stack on a random enemy to apply another Regeneration stack to the ally.

name: Burning Desire
description: Aura: For every 5 Burn applied to enemies: Shields all allies for 3.

name: Burning Mark
description: Aura: Allies gain +5% Crit Chance against enemies for every stack of Burn on them.

name: Controlled Burn
description: Aura: For every Aether purged or stolen by allies: Applies 1 Burn to the enemy with the lowest amount of Burn.

name: Conversion Pact
description: Aura: At the end of your turn: Deals a Fire/Water hit to all enemies; damage equals debuffs cleansed or consumed from allies this round. Doesn't trigger Retaliate.

name: Converter
description: On Action: Applies 1 Affliction to self and converts 1 random Aether into Wild Aether.

name: Cosmic Absorption
description: For every 15 damage absorbed by Shields on this monster: Generates Wild Aether.

name: Cosmic Fire
description: Aura: Every 3rd Fire Aether generated by your allies is converted into Wild Aether. Wild Aether also counts as Fire Aether for the effects of your skills.

name: Critical Bleed
description: On Crit: Applies 1 Bleed. Bleed can also be applied by Affliction as long as you have any Actions or Traits that can apply Bleed.

name: Critical Purging
description: On every 3 Crits: Purges 1 enemy Aether.

name: Cursed
description: Aura: Whenever an enemy's Weakness is consumed: Applies 1 Terror to that enemy.

name: Dark Exchange
description: Whenever this monster deals Wild Damage to an enemy: Cleanses 3 debuffs from self and applies them to that enemy. Triggers up to once per enemy per turn.

name: Deadly Sting
description: On Crit, if it was triggered by Force: Applies 5 Poison.

name: Eldritch Horror
description: Gains Aging. For every 3 Age: Applies Terror stacks to the enemy with the lowest amount of Terror equal to the total amount of Age on all allies.

name: Electrical Burn
description: Aura: Whenever an enemy reaches 5 Burn stacks: Deals a Fire/Wind Hit with 11 damage to that enemy and applies Dodge to self. Triggers only once per enemy per combat.

name: Endless Endurance
description: Gains Aging. For every 3 Age: Applies Redirect and Shields self for 2 x 6.

name: Evasion Mastery
description: Aura: Crit Chance on allies also increases their Evasion by 50% of that amount.

name: Experienced Strikes
description: Gains Aging. For every 2 Age: Applies Sidekick to self. Sidekick on this monster deals additional damage equal to the amount of Age stacks on it.

name: Exploit
description: On Interrupt: Applies Sidekick to self.

name: Fast Metabolism
description: On Attack, if this monster has 2 or more Regeneration: Applies Sidekick to self, triggers Regeneration on self, and then consumes another Regeneration stack.

name: Fear Toxin
description: Aura: Poison on enemies with Terror does Wild Damage and deals 1 extra damage for every 3 Terror stacks on the enemy.

name: Fierce Summoning
description: Aura: Whenever an allied Minion is summoned or dies: Applies 1 Force to its attached monster.

name: First Aid
description: Aura: Whenever Regeneration is applied to an ally: Heals them for 3.

name: Flawless Defense
description:
Retaliate: Shields self for 3.
For every 25 Shield applied to this monster: Applies Power to self.

name: Grim Servitude
description: Aura: On Action from an allied Minion: Consumes 1 Essence on that Minion to apply 5 Terror to {target enemy}.

name: Healing Hex
description: Aura: Whenever an enemy's Weakness is consumed: Heals the ally with the lowest health for 3.

name: Hexing Minions
description: Aura: On Attack from an allied Minion, if the enemy has Weakness: It deals a 3 Wild Damage Hit to the enemy.

name: Hour of Glory
description: Aura: When your allies land 10 Crits within a single round: Applies 1 Power to each ally and heals each ally for 10.

name: Indomitable Attacks
description: On Attack: Cleanses 2 debuffs from self. Whenever a debuff is cleansed from this monster: Heals self for 2.

name: Instant Regeneration
description: On Dedicated Support Action: Triggers Regeneration on each ally; then applies 1 Force to each ally that had Regeneration trigger this way.

name: Joust
description: On Dedicated Support Action: Applies 1 Force and 1 Sidekick to self.

name: Leader of Minions
description: Aura: On Attack: Allied Minions gain Damage +1, Healing +1, and Shielding +1 until end of turn. Can stack.

name: Leeching Bond
description: Aura: Whenever one or more Regeneration stacks are consumed on this monster: Deals a 10 Earth/Water damage hit to all enemies with Weakness.

name: Live and Learn
description: Retaliate: Applies 1 Dodge and 2 Regeneration to self. Triggers up to once per turn.

name: Loyal Minions
description: Aura: Allied Minions start with 1 more Essence and prevent 1 Corruption on their attached monster from each enemy Attack.

name: Martial Prowess
description: Aura: Whenever an ally evades a Hit: Applies Sidekick to them. Triggers up to once per ally per turn.

name: Massive Damage
description: This monster gains +2 max health for every level it has. It gains +1 Crit Damage for every 20 max health.

name: Massive Regeneration
description: This monster gains +2 max health for every level it has. It heals 1 more health from Regeneration for every 25 max health.

name: Mesmerize
description: Whenever allies apply 3 or more Weakness in the same turn: Applies Redirect and Shields self for 3. Triggers up to once per round.

name: Nimble Guardian
description: Whenever Dodge is applied to this monster: Applies Dodge and Redirect to self. Triggers up to once per turn.

name: Nurture
description: On Dedicated Support Action: Applies 1 Essence to each allied Minion. Then heals each ally equal to the Essence of their Minions.

name: Overheat
description: Aura: At the end of your turn: Triggers Burn on each enemy with 3 or more Burn and applies 3 Burn to this monster for each one.

name: Overwhelming Heat
description: On Attack: Applies 1 Burn to target enemy for every Power stack on this monster.

name: Peak Calamity
description: Aura: Whenever an ally attacks an enemy with 5 or more Terror: Applies Power to that ally.

name: Perseverance
description: Aura: Whenever a debuff is applied to an ally: 10% chance to apply Dodge to them.

name: Poison Glands
description: Retaliate: Applies 4 Poison to the enemy.

name: Polishing
description: Gains Aging. Whenever Age is applied to this monster: Applies 1 Force to each ally with Force.

name: Power Healing
description: Whenever Power is applied to this monster: Heals each ally for 3.

name: Prime Absorption
description: Aura: For every 20 damage absorbed by Shields on allies: Applies Power to the ally with the lowest amount of Power.

name: Proliferate
description: Whenever this monster applies a debuff: Deals a 4 Earth/Water damage Hit to the enemy and applies 1 Poison to them. Triggers up to once per enemy per round.

name: Purge Punishment
description: Retaliate, if this monster has 50% or more health: Purges 1 enemy Aether.

name: Quicken
description: For every 15 healing this monster receives or applies to allies: Applies Sidekick to self.

name: Recovery
description:
Corruption Cleanse +2.
At the start of your turn: This monster heals itself equal to 1/2 of the damage it took last round.

name: Redemption
description: On Dedicated Support Action: Cleanses 2 debuffs from each ally; then applies 1 Force to each ally that had at least 1 debuff cleansed this way.

name: Rejuvenation
description: Aura: Whenever Regeneration is consumed by an ally: Cleanses 2 debuff stacks from them and applies them to random enemies.

name: Serpentine Maneuvers
description: Aura: For every 4 Hits evaded by your allies: Applies Power to the ally with the lowest amount of Power.

name: Shadow Meld
description: Aura: Whenever an ally attacks an enemy with 3 or more Terror: Applies Dodge to that ally.

name: Shielded Torment
description: At the end of your turn: Shields self for 2 for every debuff stack on it.

name: Sidecrits
description: This monster's Sidekick Attack is always Critical.

name: Siphoned Strength
description: For every 3 Weakness stacks consumed by enemies: Applies Force to self.

name: Slasher
description: Aura: Attacks of your allies increase the amount of Terror on the attacked enemies by 33%, rounded up, instead of consuming stacks. At the end of your turn: Consumes 66% of all Terror stacks on enemies, rounded up.

name: Smite
description: Aura: For every 15 damage the first Hit of an Attack deals, it gains +1 Poise Damage.

name: Split Aether
description: On Attack: Consumes up to one Wild Aether to deal a 7 Wild Damage Hit and Purge 1 enemy Aether.

name: Synchronous Aging
description: Aura: Whenever you reach 5 Aether of the same element: Applies Age and Shields all allies with Age for 3. Triggers up to once per element per combat.

name: Synchronous Force
description: Aura: When you reach 5 Aether of the same element: Generates 2 additional Aether of the same element and applies 1 Force to each ally. Triggers up to once per element per combat.

name: Synchronous Healing
description: Aura: Whenever you reach 5 Aether of the same element: Heals all allies for 2 x 4. Triggers up to once per element per combat.

name: Synchronous Surge
description: Aura: Whenever you reach 5 Aether of the same element: Applies 2 Weakness and deals 5 damage of that element to each enemy. Triggers up to once per element per combat.

name: Tainted Power
description: Aura: Whenever Power is applied to an ally: Applies Power and 2 Affliction to them. Triggers up to once per ally per turn.

name: Tormentor
description: On Interrupt: Applies 5 Terror to that enemy and heals self for 5.

name: Toxic Assault
description: On every 3 Crits: Applies 2 Poison, then triggers Poison.

name: Toxic Cycle
description: Aura: Whenever allies apply 5 or more Poison in the same turn: Applies Regeneration to each ally. Triggers up to once per round.

name: Toxic Shielding
description: Whenever this monster receives or applies Shield: Applies Poison to the enemy with the lowest amount of Poison.

name: Toxic Summoning
description: Aura: When an allied Minion is summoned: Applies 1 Poison to all enemies. When an allied Minion dies: Triggers Poison on all enemies.

name: True Grit
description: Whenever Redirect is applied to this monster: Shields self for 7.

name: Vengence
description: When an allied Minion or monster dies: Applies Power to this monster.

name: Vigorous Edge
description: Aura: Your allies gain +15% Crit Chance for every Regeneration stack on them. Each Attack consumes 1 Regeneration.

name: Viral Healing
description: Aura: Whenever allies heal for 50 or more in the same turn: Triggers Poison on all enemies. Triggers up to once per round.

name: Void Infusion
description: Aura: Whenever Wild Aether is spent on an ally's Action, its second Hit does Wild Damage. If it's a Support Action, it applies 1 Terror to each enemy instead.

name: Breach The Void
description: This monster can copy its last Action and use it once, with its cost replaced by Wild Aether and as a Free Action. Its Element becomes Wild.

name: Critical Mass
description: On Crit: 50% chance to apply a [random buff] to self. Whenever this monster applies a buff: Heals the buffed monster for 3.

name: Eagle Eyes
description:
This monster can copy the last 2 enemy Actions and use them once.
On Copied Action: Purges the same amounts and elements of Aether as were spent on the Action.

name: Earthen Striker
description:
For every 15 Shield this monster receives or applies to allies: Applies Sidekick to self.
Sidekick Attacks of this monster consume all Sidekick stacks at once to deal their combined damage to the enemy. Additional stacks consumed are affected by damage modifiers.

name: Exalted
description: At the start of your turn: Applies Sidekick to this monster and applies 2 Essence to its attached Minions. This monster cannot learn any Attacks.

name: Fearless (Shifted)
description: While this monster has 2 or more Power, it evades the first Hit of each enemy Attack and has: "Retaliate: Triggers a 2 x 1 Earth/Fire Attack against the enemy."

name: Fearless
description: While this monster has 1 or more Force, it evades the first Hit of each enemy Attack and has: "Retaliate: Triggers a 2 x 2 Fire/Water Attack against the enemy."

name: Feed the Void
description: Gains Aging. When another allied Minion dies: Generates Wild Aether and applies X Terror to the enemy with the lowest amount of Terror, where X is the amount of Age on this monster.

name: Feed the Void (Shifted)
description: Gains Aging. When another allied Minion dies: Generates Wild Aether and applies X Burn to the enemy with the lowest amount of Burn, where X is the amount of Age on this monster.

name: Gift of the Wyrm
description:
On Support Action: Applies Temporary Power to self.
On Attack: Transfers all Power and Temporary Power stacks to every other ally.

name: Glutton
description: Regeneration heals this monster for 10% of its max health, rounded up, but doesn't trigger at the start of the turn. On Attack from this monster or its Minions: Triggers Regeneration on self and deals an Earth / Fire Hit to target enemy equal to the healed amount.

name: Glutton (Shifted)
description: Regeneration heals this monster for 10% of its max health, rounded up, but doesn't trigger at the start of the turn. On Attack from this monster or its Minions: Triggers Regeneration on self and deals an Earth / Water Hit to target enemy equal to the healed amount.

name: Hot Temper
description: Retaliate: Applies 1 Temporary Power to self. Every 7 times this Trait triggers: Applies 4 Burn to each enemy.

name: Hundred Handed (Shifted)
description: Gains Aging. At the end of your turn, if this monster has 3 or more Age: Triggers an Attack against each enemy that deals 1 x 5 Fire/Water damage for every 3 Age stacks and applies 1 Burn to each enemy.

name: Hundred Handed
description: Gains Aging. At the end of your turn, if this monster has 3 or more Age: Triggers an Attack against each enemy that deals 1 x 5 Fire/Wind damage for every 3 Age stacks and applies 1 Weakness to each enemy.

name: Judgment
description: Aura: Whenever one or more {shielded} allies get attacked: Triggers Poison on the enemy and applies Force to the attacked allies.

name: Lamentation of Woes (Shifted)
description:
Retaliate: Cleanses 1 debuff from self.
For every 4 debuffs cleansed from self: Triggers an Attack that deals 1 x 4 Earth / Wind damage to all enemies and applies 4 Affliction to each enemy.

name: Lamentation of Woes
description:
Retaliate: Cleanses 1 debuff from self.
For every 4 debuffs cleansed from self: Triggers an Attack that deals 1 x 4 Earth / Water damage to all enemies and applies 4 Affliction to each enemy.

name: Levitation (Shifted)
description: For every 9 Aether consumed by allies: Applies Dodge to this monster. Each Attack consumes a Dodge stack to gain +1 {damage} and Steal 1 Aether.

name: Levitation
description: For every 9 Aether consumed by allies: Applies Dodge to this monster. Each Attack consumes a Dodge stack to gain 30% Crit Chance and +3 Crit Damage.

name: Living Tome
description:
Whenever your allies spend 2 Aether of each element, Unleash Tome may be used once.
Unleash Tome: Uses a powerful Action without spending Aether and as a Free Action, from a choice of three random Actions. Wild Aether spent fills the least filled element.

name: Monster Chef
description: On Action, if the action didn't consume Cooking stacks: Applies Cooking to self and Regeneration to the ally with the lowest amount of Regeneration.

name: Power Nexus
description: For every 5 Aether purged, Aether stolen, or Weakness applied by the party: Applies Power to self.

name: Primeval Blight
description:
On Crit: Applies Poison.
This monster gains +4% Crit Chance for every Poison stack on enemies.

name: Putrid Odor (Shifted)
description:
On Action: Applies 2 Burn to self.
Whenever Burn triggers on this monster: Enemies also take damage from it. Doesn't trigger Retaliate.

name: Putrid Odor
description:
On Action: Applies 2 Poison to self.
Whenever Poison triggers on this monster: Enemies also take damage from it. Doesn't trigger Retaliate.

name: Rime Wind (Shifted)
description: Whenever damage is dealt to this monster's Shield: Deals a combined Earth/Wind hit to the attacker with that much damage.

name: Rime Wind
description: Whenever damage is dealt to this monster's Shield: Deals a combined Water/Wind hit to the attacker with that much damage.

name: Schadenfreude (Shifted)
description:
Aura: The first ally and the first enemy that use an Action each turn get 2 Poison or 2 Burn applied to them.
This monster gains +1 Damage and +6% Evasion for every 10 debuff stacks among all monsters in combat.

name: Schadenfreude
description:
Aura: The first ally and the first enemy that use an Action each turn get 2 Terror or 2 Burn applied to them.
This monster gains +1 Damage and +6% Evasion for every 10 debuff stacks among all monsters in combat.

name: Scorched Earth (Shifted)
description: Whenever this monster applies one or more Terror stacks to an enemy: Breaks 1 Poise on them.

name: Scorched Earth
description: Whenever this monster applies one or more Burn stacks to an enemy: Breaks 1 Poise on them.

name: Shining Spark (Shifted)
description: Gains Aging. The first Hit of each Attack of this monster deals +1 damage for every 2 buff stacks on it and Shields self equal to that amount.

name: Shining Spark
description: The first Hit of each Attack of this monster deals +1 damage for every 2 buff stacks on it and Shields self equal to that amount.

name: Tides of the Void
description: Aura: Whenever an ally or enemy uses an Action of a certain element: Generates Wild Aether. The element is randomly chosen at the start of every round.

name: Toxic Tides
description: Whenever this monster receives or applies a heal: Applies Poison to the enemy with the lowest amount of Poison.

name: Two Headed (Shifted)
description: On Attack, if it was this monster's first Attack of the turn: Applies 2 Weakness to target enemy. If it was this monster's second Attack of the turn: Applies Power to self.

name: Two Headed
description: On Attack, if it was this monster's first Attack of the turn: Heals the ally with the lowest health by 5. If it was this monster's second Attack of the turn: Applies Power to self.

name: Vampirism
description: Aura: Terror on enemies deals 2 more damage and heals the attacker for 33% of the damage of the hit, rounded up.

name: Wholesome
description:
At the start of combat: Applies 1 Regeneration to self.
Whenever Regeneration triggers on this monster: Applies Regeneration to each other ally, then triggers Regeneration on them.
